name: Rime of the Ancient Mariner PulpBook
name_original: Rime of the Ancient Mariner PulpBook
description:
A WIP. Transcribing Samuel Taylor Coleridge's The Rime of the Ancient Mariner to the playdate. I plan to add scene changes to reflect the passages or mood of the poem and of course the other parts. I just wanted to be able to carry some epic poetry on my playdate. Hope you enjoy.

Disclaimer: I am not responsible for what befalls anyone that shoots an albatross with a crossbow...
